data.seoTitle: i-a · A studio for passion projects
data.pageDescription: Independent Arts is a network of people, ideas and resources to bring our most precious dreams alive.
Explore innovative Nigerian projects, from animated shows and queer storytelling to album cover archives and contemporary art, supported by Independent Arts.
Independent Arts empowers Nigerian creators with grants, production, research, and press for passion projects, bridging the gap in institutional support and nurturing emerging talent since 2021.
Explore the latest updates, insights, and press coverage from Independent Arts.
